verses.verse: שַׁאֲל֨וּ <S%H7592><s%> sha-'a-Lu Ask מֵיְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh ye of the LORD מָטָר֙ <S%H4306><s%> ma-Tar rain בְּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> be-'Et in the time מַלְק֔וֹשׁ <S%H4456><s%> mal-Koosh, of the latter rain יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [so] the LORD עֹשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh shall make חֲזִיזִ֑ים <S%H2385><s%> cha-zi-Zim; bright clouds וּמְטַר־ <S%H4306><s%> u-me-tar- of rain גֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <S%H1653><s%> ge-shem them showers יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten and give לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem, like לְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish to every one עֵ֥שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> 'E-sev grass בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh. in the field

כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ki because הַתְּרָפִ֣ים <S%H8655><s%> hat-te-ra-Fim For the idols דִּבְּרוּ־ <S%H1696><s%> dib-be-ru- have spoken אָ֗וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven, vanity וְהַקּֽוֹסְמִים֙ <S%H7080><s%> ve-hak-kos-Mim and the diviners חָ֣זוּ <S%H2372><s%> Cha-zu have seen שֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> She-ker, a lie וַֽחֲלֹמוֹת֙ <S%H2472><s%> va-cha-lo-mOt dreams הַשָּׁ֣וא <S%H7723><s%> hash-Sha-v false. יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Be-ru, and have told הֶ֖בֶל <S%H1892><s%> He-vel in vain יְנַֽחֵמ֑וּן <S%H5162><s%> ye-na-che-Mun; they comfort עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> ken after that נָסְע֣וּ <S%H5265><s%> na-se-'U therefore they went כְמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> che-mov- like צֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> Tzon, their way as a flock יַעֲנ֖וּ <S%H6031><s%> ya-'a-Nu they were troubled כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there רֹעֶֽה׃ <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Eh. because [there was] no shepherd פ Peh

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against הָֽרֹעִים֙ <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Im against the shepherds חָרָ֣ה <S%H2734><s%> cha-Rah was kindled אַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pi, Mine anger וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- against הָעַתּוּדִ֖ים <S%H6260><s%> ha-'at-tu-Dim the goats אֶפְק֑וֹד <S%H6485><s%> ef-Kod; and I punished כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for פָקַד֩ <S%H6485><s%> fa-Kad hath visited יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD צְבָא֤וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֶדְרוֹ֙ <S%H5739><s%> ed-Ro his flock אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְשָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> ve-Sam and hath made אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, כְּס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> ke-Sus horse הוֹד֖וֹ <S%H1935><s%> ho-Do them as his goodly בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> bam-mil-cha-Mah. in the battle

מִמֶּ֤נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu at פִנָּה֙ <S%H6438><s%> fin-Nah the corner מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu them יָתֵ֔ד <S%H3489><s%> ya-Ted, out of him the nail מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu them קֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> Ke-shet bow מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah; out of him the battle מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu them יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze Out of him came forth כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol every נוֹגֵ֖שׂ <S%H5065><s%> no-Ges out of him every oppressor יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav. together

וְהָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu will be as כְגִבֹּרִ֜ים <S%H1368><s%> che-gib-bo-Rim And they shall be as mighty בּוֹסִ֨ים <S%H947><s%> bo-Sim [men] which tread down בְּטִ֤יט <S%H2916><s%> be-Tit [their enemies] in the mire חוּצוֹת֙ <S%H2351><s%> chu-tzOt of the streets בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> bam-mil-cha-Mah, in the battle וְנִ֨לְחֲמ֔וּ <S%H3898><s%> ve-Nil-cha-Mu, and they shall fight כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh because the LORD עִמָּ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mam; with וְהֹבִ֖ישׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> ve-ho-Vi-shu shall be confounded רֹכְבֵ֥י <S%H7392><s%> ro-che-Vei [is] with them and the riders סוּסִֽים׃ <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim. on horses

וְגִבַּרְתִּ֣י׀ <S%H1396><s%> ve-gib-bar-Ti And I will strengthen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef of Joseph אוֹשִׁ֔יעַ <S%H3467><s%> o-Shi-a', and I will save וְהֽוֹשְׁבוֹתִים֙ <S%H7725><s%> ve-ho-she-vo-Tim will bring כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because רִֽחַמְתִּ֔ים <S%H7355><s%> ri-cham-Tim, them for I have mercy וְהָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu shall be as כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher upon them and they shall be as though לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- had not זְנַחְתִּ֑ים <S%H2186><s%> ze-nach-Tim; I had not cast them off כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Ki, Because אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem their God וְאֶעֱנֵֽם׃ <S%H6030><s%> ve-'e-'e-Nem. and will hear

וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu will be like כְגִבּוֹר֙ <S%H1368><s%> che-gib-bOr shall be like a mighty אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, And [they of] Ephraim וְשָׂמַ֥ח <S%H8055><s%> ve-sa-Mach shall rejoice לִבָּ֖ם <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bam [man] and their heart כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> ke-mov- if יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin; as through wine וּבְנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-nei-Hem yea their children יִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'U shall see וְשָׂמֵ֔חוּ <S%H8056><s%> ve-sa-Me-chu, glad יָגֵ֥ל <S%H1523><s%> ya-Gel shall rejoice לִבָּ֖ם <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bam their heart בַּיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. in the LORD

אֶשְׁרְקָ֥ה <S%H8319><s%> 'esh-re-Kah I will hiss לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem וַאֲקַבְּצֵ֖ם <S%H6908><s%> va-'a-kab-be-Tzem for them and gather כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for פְדִיתִ֑ים <S%H6299><s%> fe-di-Tim; them for I have redeemed וְרָב֖וּ <S%H7235><s%> ve-ra-Vu them and they shall increase כְּמ֥וֹ <S%H3644><s%> ke-Mo will be as רָבֽוּ׃ <S%H7235><s%> ra-Vu. as they have increased

וְאֶזְרָעֵם֙ <S%H2232><s%> ve-'ez-ra-'Em And I will sow בָּֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> ba-'am-Mim, them among the people וּבַמֶּרְחַקִּ֖ים <S%H4801><s%> u-vam-mer-chak-Kim me in far countries יִזְכְּר֑וּנִי <S%H2142><s%> yiz-ke-Ru-ni; and they shall remember וְחָי֥וּ <S%H2421><s%> ve-cha-Yu and they shall live אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> be-nei-Hem with their children וָשָֽׁבוּ׃ <S%H7725><s%> va-Sha-vu. and turn again

וַהֲשִֽׁיבוֹתִים֙ <S%H7725><s%> va-ha-shi-vo-Tim I will bring them again מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz also out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt וּמֵֽאַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> u-me-'ash-Shur them out of Assyria אֲקַבְּצֵ֑ם <S%H6908><s%> 'a-kab-be-Tzem; and gather וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- into אֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz them into the land גִּלְעָ֤ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad of Gilead וּלְבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> u-le-va-nOn and Lebanon אֲבִיאֵ֔ם <S%H935><s%> 'a-vi-'Em, and I will bring וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo no יִמָּצֵ֖א <S%H4672><s%> yim-ma-Tze and [place] shall not be found לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H99999><s%> la-Hem.

וְעָבַ֨ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var And he shall pass through בַּיָּ֜ם <S%H3220><s%> bai-Yam the sea צָרָ֗ה <S%H6869><s%> tza-Rah, with affliction וְהִכָּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> ve-hik-Kah and shall smite בַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> vai-Yam in the sea גַּלִּ֔ים <S%H1530><s%> gal-Lim, the waves וְהֹבִ֕ישׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> ve-ho-Vi-shu shall dry up כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all מְצוּל֣וֹת <S%H4688><s%> me-tzu-Lot and all the deeps יְאֹ֑ר <S%H2975><s%> ye-'Or; of the river וְהוּרַד֙ <S%H3381><s%> ve-hu-Rad shall be brought down גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> ge-'on and the pride אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur, of Assyria וְשֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> ve-She-vet and the sceptre מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt יָסֽוּר׃ <S%H5493><s%> ya-Sur. shall depart away

וְגִבַּרְתִּים֙ <S%H1396><s%> ve-gib-bar-Tim And I will strengthen בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, them in the LORD וּבִשְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> u-vish-Mo in his name יִתְהַלָּ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> yit-hal-La-chu; and they shall walk up and down נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek
